DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether mobile phone application ( `` app '' ) Major Depression Generalized Anxiety Disorder practical acceptable young men attract men , whether reduces anxiety depressive symptom . The investigator also evaluate whether reduction symptom maintain 10 week follow-up period young men complete mobile phone intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Mobile Phone App Depression Anxiety Young Men Who Are Attracted Men
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study conduct feasibility trial small randomize control trial ( RCT ) 10-week , culturally tailor mobile phone intervention use principle cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) reduce anxiety depression among young men sexually attract male . The primary purpose feasibility study collect feedback intervention participant . This feedback , along usage data feature use less often participant , feature use , evaluate make improvement intervention . The investigator also assess clinical outcome ( anxiety depressive symptom ) . After feasibility trial , investigator conduct small RCT , outcomes monitor pre- , mid- , post-treatment , well twice 10 week follow-up period .
DOC.criteria: Male birth sex male gender identity Reports sexual attraction toward male Is 1720 year age Is able speak read English Resides Chicago metropolitan area ( i.e. , Chicago suburbs Cook County ) Has past , currently , regularly use mobile phone Current Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental DisordersIV diagnosis Major Depressive Disorder Generalized Anxiety Disorder assess use MiniInternational Neuropsychiatric Interview , plus score 10 Patient Health Questionnaire9 5 GAD7 Has visual , hearing , voice , motor impairment would prevent completion study procedure use Internet mobile phone Per selfreported history MiniInternational Neuropsychiatric Interview , ever diagnose psychotic disorder bipolar disorder , currently diagnose obsessive compulsive disorder substance dependence , diagnose past five year posttraumatic stress disorder , dissociative disorder , eat disorder ; evidence another condition indicate intervention may insufficient Has ever hospitalize psychiatric reason attempt suicide , score 4 Columbia Suicide Severity Rating Scale , report nonsuicidal selfinjury nature suggest intervention may insufficient Is participate `` Crew 450 , '' `` Keep It Up , '' `` My Peeps , '' `` Q2 '' Reports currently Illinois Department Child Family Services ( DCFS ) custody Reports currently psychotherapy Initiation , discontinuation , adjustment antidepressant medication past 4 week Less 8th grade read level Study staff receive participant 's reply test message send use mobile phone several day `` runin '' prior enrollment Plans begin psychotherapy next 10 week ( exclusion criterion feasibility trial , RCT )
